page.title: 18Employment in Whitminster.
page.content:
Continued from page 17.
The current owner of Fromebridge Mill is interested in a project to make electricity from the weir and to further modernise the plant.
The mill used to have a row of six cottages for the workers. Several of these have been modernised and one of the employees lives in one of them. The office manager lives in Gloucester and travels to work.
The mill is actually owned by a Greek who lives in Athens. On a day to day basis the mill is run by his wife.
The mill has a farm attached which raises beef cattle.
